column5: Looking to scrap my 1999 Windstar winter beater and was wondering if anyone here could recommend a decent scraper in the GTA. Also does anyone have a clue what they normally pay out on these kind of vehicles? I know it won't be much, just kind of looking for a ball park idea.
If you can find a scrap metal place,you will get more money. WIEGHT WISE.
I went to a place in Keswick and got around $400 for a Mercury Mystique.

If its driving you can drive it down to Hamilton and they will pay you by the pound for the scrap steel. I think that will likely net you the best return. I would think 200-500 dollars is within the ballpark dending on the price of steel right now. I would call them to make sure first. Wentowrth recycling 905-527-1707
http://www.junkmyride.ca  I got $250 for a old BEAT UP gmc safari and they picked it up.
